resources.string: (This feature is not recommended for indoor use)
You can place the camera on a shelf or any other flat surface, or you can mount it on a wall or ceiling.
Enable the permission in the phone "Settings" \n allow your mobile phone to connect the device to access the live
If access to Camera is not enabled, you will not be able to scan the QR code.
If access to Local Network is not enabled, you will not be able to watch live.
If access to Location is not enabled, the app will not be able to obtain the current location automatically.
Allow access to Location to automatically fill in the Wi-Fi currently connected to your mobile phone, and the obtained Wi-Fi information will be used to add your camera to the app.
If access to Microphone is not enabled, you will not be able to use two-way audio feature.
If access to Photos is not enabled, you will not be able to save picture or videos to your phone album.
You have reached the limit of SD card video viewers, please retry later.
This Username is already in use.
Your account has been successfully linked to Alexa. If you encounter any problems in use, please go to "User"-"Streaming Interconnection" to check the status of your camera or view FAQ.
When motion is detected, the camera will automatically track the movement.
The camera always records all videos, but you will receive a notification only in case movement is detected in the Activity Zone(s).
When you hear "Scan QR code", you can proceed to the next step.
Press power button to turn on
Street and number, P.O. box, c/o.
Detailed address, e.g., apartment, house number, etc.
The account of the camera admin and the secondary user(s) must be in the same country.
Please contact the admin to reactivate the camera if needed.
After ticking the analysis item(s), the recorded video will be analyzed encrypted to recognize Person, Pet, Vehicle, or Package. You can tick more than one item.
After ticking the analysis item(s), the recorded video will be analyzed encrypted to recognize Person or Pet. You can tick more than one item.
There are currently a variety of analysis results: Person, Pet. Please tap the link below and jump to the screen to set the analysis items for your cameras one by one.
There are currently a variety of analysis results: Person, Pet, Vehicle, and Package. Please tap the link below and jump to the screen to set the analysis items for your cameras one by one.
Once you turn on the Classification feature, the camera will analyze the video and identify the following categories: Person, Pet, Vehicle, Package.
Once you turn on the Classification feature, the camera will analyze the video and identify the following categories: Person, Pet.
The alarm volume cannot be set below 10.
Click Allow to link your VicoHome account with Alexa.\nIf Allow：
Align QR code to the frame to scan.
Allow the access to the phone camera to scan the QR code on the camera.
Allow access to photos in the phone settings.
Turn on location access to automatically obtain the current Wi-Fi name and configure it for the camera (recommended), or manually enter the Wi-Fi name (case sensitive).
Turn on location access to automatically obtain the Wi-Fi name (SSID) currently in use on the phone.
This e-mail already exists. Try signing in instead.
Google Payment not detected. Please verify that the payment channel is available before purchasing again.
If the anti-flicker is on, the camera will neutralize the strobe effect of the alternating current. It solves the screen flickering.
Already updated to the latest version.

\u3000\u3000In order to comply with the relevant policies and provide a better service to users in China, VicoHome App will be changed to 全橙看家 App on %s.
\u3000\u3000Please download 全橙看家 ASAP. You can sign in to 全橙看家 directly through your VicoHome account. All your camera info and the Awareness service plan will be retained and you will be able to continue to use it.
\u3000\u3000After the expiration date, VicoHome App will no longer be available. Learn more >>

\u3000\u3000In order to comply with the relevant policies and provide a better service to users in China, VicoHome App changed to 全橙看家 App on %s.
\u3000\u3000VicoHome App can no longer be used. Please download 全橙看家 ASAP. You can sign in to 全橙看家 directly through your VicoHome account. All your camera info and the Awareness service plan will be retained and you can continue to use it. Learn more >>
This phone does not support the purchase.
If the sleep mode is on, the camera will automatically enter sleep mode according to the sleep schedule.
Cameras that support Alexa will automatically restart and switch to H.264 to connect with Alexa devices.
The camera will end the recording after the movement stops, the maximum time is 3 minutes.
The 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi networks available are:
Low battery, unable to upgrade. Please charge the battery to at least 10% and retry.
Please long press the power button until the camera emits a tip sound.

When you hear a "Ding Dong" sound from the camera or see the flashing light, use the device to scan the QR code at a distance about 6-12 inches (15-30 cm). If you don\'t hear any sound, double-click the power button to make the device entering the scanning QR code mode. You will hear a beep sound when the QR code is successfully scanned.
After the camera has completed rotation, you can proceed to the next step.
Proceed to the next step after the startup sound.
Turn on the camera according to the instruction on the camera body.
Confirm that the camera emits a sound or that the Indicator Light flashes
Remember the Wi-Fi name and password after successful connection.
Keep the phone at about 6-12 inches (15-30 cm) from the camera to scan the QR code, and complete the scanning process after the beep
Once the connection is successful, you will be automatically redirected to the next step.
%s (%s) has acceped your request of accessing the camera.
Browse Shared cameras to find it.
Enable Bluetooth to easily bind the camera
Turn on the "Bluetooth" feature in the system control center
* Awareness applies only to the camera admin rights. Secondary users can enjoy it only through the admin rights.
When the "Alarm" feature is on, the camera will automatically emit an alert sound when it detects a movement.
When the features "Alarm" or "Flashlight" are on, the camera will automatically alert you when it detects a movement.
The camera is being used, please try later.
Where would you like to place this camera?
Unknown camera, please contact the retailer.
The camera is turned off. Please turn it on.
The camera automatically switched off due to low battery at %s, please charge it.
Try rebooting the router. If it does not help, try reconnecting your camera to Wi-Fi by "Add a new camera" button.
Allow camera access in the phone "Settings" to scan the QR code.
The camera is offline. Please make sure that the camera is turned on and connected to a Wi-Fi network.
The camera is in sleep mode
The camera will turn on tomorrow at %s.

The camera will not record, alarm, and push notifications.

Failed to obtain Wi-Fi network name (SSID). Please choose a different Wi-Fi for your phone or enter the Wi-Fi name manually.
Failed to obtain Wi-Fi network name (SSID)
Did not receive the verification code?
After clicking on "Send verification code", you will receive the e-mail with the verification code in the registered e-mail within 60 seconds.
If the network connection is unstable, please wait up to about 5 minutes.
If after 5 minutes you still haven\'t received the verification code, please check the spam folder of the registered e-mail.
If after 5 minutes you still haven\'t received the verification code, please check the spam folder of the registered e-mail.
If after 5 minutes you still haven\'t received the verification code, please check the spam folder of the registered e-mail.

Pictures can\'t be taken during the video recording.
This account is already being used. Please use a different e-mail.
This account is already being used. Please use a different phone number.
Double-click the button on the camera to enter the network connection mode. When the blue light is blinking, the device is ready to be connected.
Do you want to save the changes?
Failed to change the password. Please retry.
For the safety of your account, your password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number. It must have at least 8 characters.

We are glad to inform you that we have released a new app, %s, which is the upgraded version of Vicoo. Vicoo will not be updated anymore. Please switch to our new app %s as we believe it will provide a much better user experience.

You just need to click on the button below "Go to download" to open the Google Play Store or search "%s" directly in the Google Play Store, install the new app, and sign in with your Vicoo account. Everything (your cameras, data, and settings) will remain unchanged.

You only need to click on the button below "Go to download" to open the Google Play Store or search "%s" directly in the Google Play Store, and then register a new account. If you have any questions, please contact support@vicoo.tech .
We can\'t wait to welcome you to our new %s app. We\'d love to hear your feedback!
We just sent a verification code to your e-mail %s.
Please check your network and try again.
Please place the camera where you need to install it and check the strength of the Wi-Fi signal.
It\'s recommended to mount the camera in the current location.
The current location is not recommended to mount the camera.
There is no Wi-Fi signal at the current location. Please move the camera near the wireless router.

Use your mobile phone to scan the QR code on the camera to know the camera model. The QR code is often inside the outer shell or under the rubber plug. This QR code contains the serial number and model of the camera, usually starting with "S/N".
Please select the error message you heard
Please choose a location for your camera to enjoy a better experience.
Please choose from the following categories
The cache collects temporary data generated during use. Clearing the cache will not affect the normal use of the application.
Clearing the cache will not affect the normal use of the app.
Are you sure you want to close the merge push of all cameras?
After the merge push is closed, you will be pushed by each individual video, and the push messages will increase.

After the optimization of the product features, the record video switch gets removed. In order to not affect your usage habits, the Motion Detection switch is temporarily turned off. Please turn it on again as needed.

Usually a new camera can enter the scanning mode automatically, and you will hear a scanning sound or see a flashing light. If not, you need to double click the power button.
Confirm whether the camera is emitting a beeping sound

The camera will no longer emit any reminder sounds
When you turn on the "Speaker" feature, the camera will promptly provide acoustic feedback to inform on the status of the camera.
Congratulations, you have successfully registered\nPlease add a camera

Currently, 5 GHz Wi-Fi and enterprise Wi-Fi are not supported.
Please make sure your router is connected to an available network.
Please try rebooting the router and reconnecting.
Please try connecting to a different Wi-Fi network.
Since there are too many cameras connected to the router, you can\'t connect any more cameras. Please remove some unused or expired cameras. You may need to contact the router admin.
Please make sure that your Wi-Fi network is not an enterprise Wi-Fi network. The camera only supports networks with a security level below WPA-2.
Please make sure that the Wi-Fi password you entered is correct and case-sensitive.

If the camera is more than 9ft away from the baby, it is recommended to set the sensitivity level to High.
If the camera is very close to the baby, e.g., 3ft, it is recommended to set the sensitivity level to Low.
If the camera is 6-9ft away from the baby, it is recommended to set the sensitivity level to Medium.
When the “Cry Detection" feature is on, you will be notified if cry is detected in the baby\'s room.
Failed to acquire data, please restart the app.
Failed to delete account, please retry.
Are you sure to delete this location?
Once you detete your account, it will no longer be retrievable. To ensure the security of your account before deleting it, please confirm the following information:
There were no abnormal behaviors such as account being hacked or suspicious login activity. The account deletion is requested for other personal reasons.

If you are the admin of the camera, you will lose the viewing and setting rights of this camera after deletion. If you are shared with the camera by its admin, you will lose the viewing right after deletion.

All personal data related to this account, including library information, will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered. If you have already purchased Awareness Service, please proceed with caution.

Since the %s Awareness uses a third-party payment system, the account cancellation will not stop the automatic renewal. To avoid unnecessary deductions, please cancel the automatic renewal of the third party.
2. No longer concerned about the camera associated with this account
3. All personal data will be deleted

invited you to view the camera.

Please describe your issue and indicate the camera model. The model is usually on the label affixed to the camera\'s outer shell. Sometimes you may need to take off the shell or open the rubber plug to find it. The model can be G0, CGXX (for example CG1), CBXX (for example CB1), JXJ-FA01, etc.

Welcome to the Camera Binding Help Center! Online staff service opening hours: 10 AM-8 PM (SGT)/7 PM-5 AM (PST). Please describe your issue and indicate the camera model. The model is usually on the label affixed to the camera\'s outer shell. Sometimes you may need to take off the shell or open the rubber plug to find it. The model can be G0, CGXX (for example CG1), CBXX (for example CB1), JXJ-FA01, etc.
Welcome to the Camera Binding Help Center! Online staff service opening hours: Singapore time 10 AM-8 PM (SGT)/ 7 PM-5 AM (SPT)
OK. I will find someone who can help with your query.

Press and hold the reboot button for 3 seconds to restart the camera

Find the hole of the reboot button, press and hold it with the pin included in the package or a pointed object for 3 seconds to restart the camera. If it does not restart, you need to press and hold the power button for 3 seconds to turn it on until you hear the power-up sound or see the indicator light on.

%s has expired. The AI features will no longer be available on %s and the storage of cloud recordings will be reduced to 7-day capacity. Please purchase the service again if needed.

In order to align with the relevant regulations and provide better services to the users in China, VicoHome App will become 全橙看家 App on %s.

Please download 全橙看家 as soon as possible. You can sign in to 全橙看家 with your VicoHome account. All your camera info and Awareness service status will be retained and you will be able to continue to them.
After the expiration date, VicoHome App will no longer be usable. Learn more >>

We apologize for the inconvenience, 全橙看家 will protect your account!

VicoHome APP can no longer be used. Please download 全橙看家 as soon as possible. You can sign in to 全橙看家 directly with your VicoHome account. All your camera info and Awareness service status will be retained and you will be able to continue to use them. Learn more >>

When motion is detected, the camera will automatically sound an alarm.
Once the Motion Detector is on, the camera is triggered by the movements of the objects and it will record a video, helping you to detect changes in the environment at all times.
The joystick controller is unavailable when the Motion Tracking feature is on.
Once Motion Tracking is on, the camera will automatically follow the recording after detecting any movement.

string.description: Content description for new notification (no number count) [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: mtrl_exceed_max_badge_number_content_description

string.description: a11y string to indicate this button moves the calendar to the next month [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: mtrl_picker_a11y_next_month

string.description: a11y string to indicate this button moves the calendar to the previous month [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: mtrl_picker_a11y_prev_month

string.description: a11y string read on selection change to indicate the new selection [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: mtrl_picker_announce_current_selection

string.description: Button text to indicate that the widget will ignore the user's selection [CHAR_LIMIT=16]
string.name: mtrl_picker_cancel

string.description: Button text to indicate that the widget will save the user's selection [CHAR_LIMIT=16]
string.name: mtrl_picker_confirm

string.description: A single date [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_date_header_selected

string.description: Indicates that the user must take the action of picking a date within the calendar [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_date_header_title

string.description: Placeholder for a single date [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_date_header_unselected

string.description: a11y string to indicate this is a header for a column of days for one day of the week (e.g., Monday) [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: mtrl_picker_day_of_week_column_header

string.description: Indicates that the user entered date cannot be parsed because its format is wrong. [CHAR_LIMIT=36]
string.name: mtrl_picker_invalid_format

string.description: Tells a user what an example valid entry looks like. [CHAR_LIMIT=18]
string.name: mtrl_picker_invalid_format_example

string.description: Tells a user what format is expected for their date entry. [CHAR_LIMIT=18]
string.name: mtrl_picker_invalid_format_use

string.description: Notifies the user that the two entered dates do not represent a valid range of dates [CHAR_LIMIT=36]
string.name: mtrl_picker_invalid_range

string.description: a11y string that informs the user that tapping this button will switch the year [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: mtrl_picker_navigate_to_year_description

string.description: Notifies the user that the entered date is outside the allowed range [CHAR_LIMIT=36]
string.name: mtrl_picker_out_of_range

string.description: Placeholders for two dates separated by a dash representing a range where end date has been selected [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_range_header_only_end_selected

string.description: Placeholders for two dates separated by a dash representing a range where start date has been selected [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_range_header_only_start_selected

string.description: Two dates separated by a dash representing a range [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_range_header_selected

string.description: Indicates that the user must take the action of picking dates within the calendar to form a range [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_range_header_title

string.description: Placeholders for two dates separated by a dash representing a range [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_range_header_unselected

string.description: Confirms the selection [CHAR_LIMIT=12]
string.name: mtrl_picker_save

string.description: Label for a single date selected by the user [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_text_input_date_hint

string.description: Label for the end date in a range selected by the user [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_text_input_date_range_end_hint

string.description: Label for the start date in a range selected by the user [CHAR_LIMIT=60]
string.name: mtrl_picker_text_input_date_range_start_hint

string.description: A 1 character abbreviation for day. It will be part of a string such as dd/mm/yyyy or mm/dd/yyyy or y.mm.dd. [CHAR_LIMIT=2]
string.name: mtrl_picker_text_input_day_abbr

string.description: A 1 character abbreviation for month. It will be part of a string such as dd/mm/yyyy or mm/dd/yyyy or y.mm.dd. [CHAR_LIMIT=2]
string.name: mtrl_picker_text_input_month_abbr

string.description: A 1 character abbreviation for year. It will be part of a string such as dd/mm/yyyy or mm/dd/yyyy or y.mm.dd. [CHAR_LIMIT=2]
string.name: mtrl_picker_text_input_year_abbr

string.description: a11y string to indicate this button changes the input mode to a calendar [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: mtrl_picker_toggle_to_calendar_input_mode

string.description: a11y string to indicate this button switches the user to choosing a day [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: mtrl_picker_toggle_to_day_selection

resources.string: Tap to switch to selecting a day

string.description: a11y string to indicate this button changes the input mode to a text field [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: mtrl_picker_toggle_to_text_input_mode

string.description: a11y string to indicate this button switches the user to choosing a year [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: mtrl_picker_toggle_to_year_selection

resources.string: Tap to switch to selecting a year

If you do not renew to purchase once the current %s Awareness expires, it will automatically switch to the next plan.
A new package seems to be delivered
How to make Package Detection more accurate?
Please don’t forget to select the package in Notification Settings / Smart Push.
Please make sure that the package is clearly visible in the camera view and that it is not blocked by other objects.

It is recommended to place your camera at a height of about 8 feet (2.5 m) and tilt it so that you can clearly see your doorway and the area where the package is located. \nAt the same time, the distance between the camera and the package should not exceed 10 feet (3 m).

The package recognition accuracy is still not optimal; thus, it is continuously being optimized. It should ideally be used in a standard setting with an oblique downward viewing angle at about 7 feet (2.1 m) from the ground.
When the camera detects that the package has been picked up and put down, it will send you a message.
A package seems to be taken away

Scan the QR code at about 6-12 inches (15-30 cm) from the camera. Complete scanning when you hear another sound.

QR code can be found by following the path
Place the QR code on your phone about at 6-12 inches (15-30 cm) from the camera.
Scan the QR-Code about 6-12 inches (15-30 cm) in front of the camera after hearing the scanning sound or seeing the flashing light, and complete scanning when you hear another sound.

The Indicator Light should be blue and blinking when scanning the code. If it is in any other mode, please double-click the power button after turning it on so that the camera will enter the scanning mode and will turn into a blinking blue light.
Place the camera at 6-12 inches (15-30 cm) from the QR code. If it has not been scanned for a long time, please move it back and forth. You can refer to the figure on the previous page.
Confirm that the camera is turned on and in the code scanning mode
Adjust the distance between the camera and the QR code
